meaningMnemonic:
What <kanji>kind</kanji>s of <vocabulary>seed</vocabulary>s are you going to sow? Think about all the different kinds of seeds, and the kinds of plants they'll grow into.

This can also mean <vocabulary>source</vocabulary>, as in a source of worry or joy, or even of a good story.
readingMnemonic: Choose your <vocabulary>seed</vocabulary>s carefully, because you love to have a <reading>tan eh?</reading> (たね). You love tanning, so you don't want to plant anything that will grow tall and create shade. Choose those seed types carefully, and don't forget about your tan, eh?
